jobs.metaDescription: Join UV Agency's team and help shape the future of creative experiences. Explore career opportunities in strategy, creativity, content, media, and events.
jobs.tagline: Join UV's team and help shape the future of integrated communications. We're looking for passionate individuals who thrive in a multicultural, creative environment.
jobs.description: We specialize in strategy, creativity, content, media and experiences- all connected to help brands grow, inspire, and stay relevant in a constantly shifting world. We're grateful to be working with top brands and passionate teams to create work that resonates - emotionally and measurably. We love what we do and we know that hard work pays off.
jobs.history: Founded with a vision to blend cutting-edge technology with creative storytelling, UV has grown from a small team of passionate individuals into a powerhouse of innovation. Our journey has been marked by a relentless pursuit of excellence, a commitment to our clients' success, and a culture that fosters creativity and collaboration.
jobs.client: One Agency, All In. Full Service Independent Agency

values.name: Multicultural by Design
values.description: We thrive in diverse contexts. Different cultures, languages, and perspectives enrich our creativity and sharpen our thinking. We build for a global world ‚Äî with local understanding.

values.name: Human-Centered Thinking
values.description: People come first. We design and communicate with empathy, emotional intelligence, and awareness ‚Äî never losing sight of the human on the other side.

values.name: Radical Transparency
values.description: We speak with honesty and clarity ‚Äî with clients, within our team, always. Open dialogue is how we build trust and move forward, even through tension.

values.name: Co-Creation
values.description: The best work happens when we build together. We collaborate with clients and teammates as partners, listening actively and shaping ideas collectively.

values.name: Bold Intuition
values.description: We trust our instincts and take calculated risks. Experience, curiosity, and courage guide us to solutions that make a real difference.

values.name: Excellence in the Details
values.description: We don't do things halfway. Every touchpoint matters ‚Äî from a campaign to a line of code. We aim for professional excellence, every time.

values.name: Balanced Flow
values.description: We believe that giving and receiving are part of the same cycle. Our work is rooted in reciprocity, acknowledgment, and shared growth.

creative-director.description: Lead our creative vision and oversee the development of groundbreaking campaigns. You'll work with top brands to create work that resonates emotionally and measurably.

social-media-manager.description: Develop and execute social media strategies that engage audiences and build brand loyalty. Experience with multicultural campaigns is a plus.

account-executive.description: Serve as the primary liaison between clients and our creative teams. Build lasting relationships and ensure exceptional project delivery.

motion-designer.description: Create stunning motion graphics and animations that bring our campaigns to life. Proficiency in After Effects and Cinema 4D required.

event-producer.description: Design and execute immersive brand experiences and events. From concept to completion, you'll create moments that move people to become customers.

digital-strategist.description: Develop data-driven digital strategies that drive results. You'll combine creative thinking with analytical insights to optimize campaigns.

copywriter.description: Craft compelling copy that tells stories and drives action. Experience writing for multicultural audiences in multiple languages is highly valued.

ux-ui-designer.description: Design human-centered digital experiences that blend aesthetics with functionality. You'll work on websites, apps, and interactive installations.

influencer-marketing-manager.description: Lead influencer outreach, campaign strategy, and relationship management to drive brand awareness and engagement across social platforms.
